channel.title: Internet Women on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Internet Women on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Web Cam Girls
item.description: heh. so I stayed up real late tonight looking at web cam girl pages. what a weird world that is. I don’t quite understand it. Such a voyeuristic world we have here. poor weird cat. Sometimes the internet is not amusing. It took me far too long to realize that site was ran by racists.. for a real blow to rationality check out the whitepower kids site or maybe the whitepower womens site.
